content.title: Intro
content.content:
-ul is a suffix in Khuzdul meaning "of".[1] [2]

It is a part of the word Khuzdul, (Language) of the Dwarves. It also appears in Balin Fundinul uzbad Khazad-dûmu, Balin, (son) of Fundin, Lord of Moria.

↑ The Dwarrow Scholar, "Khuzdul Lessons & Downloads" dated 25 April 2012, thedwarrowscholar.com (accessed 15 August 2025) (Discussed in responses.)
↑ Dwarvish Dictionary
